body_html:
Thank you for the pointer @amygdala
Could you please run your cl and original code and compare the performance/convergence? It would be great to add that information here.
Also head version of Estimator should add loss automatically.

body:
Thank you for the pointer @amygdala 
Could you please run your cl and original code and compare the performance/convergence? It would be great to add that information here.
Also head version of Estimator should add loss automatically.
